item.title: Hugo and Docker: Creating My Own Static Website
item.description:
Main Idea

I wanted to create my own website. But writing code? Buff … I only like to code to automate. Begin to remember HTML and CSS again to create a web isn’t funny and obiously JavaScript is forbidden. Doing my usually search of projects and technologies I came to a website with a lot of “good stuff”. Open Source technologies and projects, this website was https://after-dark.habd.as/

After Dark is open source software you can use to build a secure website, blog or app.

I though “Great!” the website mention all features, modules and projects used to create your own site and I started to take a look on them until I reach HUGO
